author: Ryan Sidle
description: You'd have put your house on Lionel Messi scoring from here.
title: WATCH: Lionel Messi Proves He's Human With Embarrassing Miss | SPORTbible

description: Lionel Messi is in, but Neymar is out as Argentina and Brazil name seriously strong squads for their friendly match at the MCG in June.
title: Messi Melbourne-bound, but no Neymar for Argentina-Brazil friendly

author: FourFourTwo
description: Barcelona star Lionel Messi has scored more than any LaLiga rival for the fourth time, earning as many Pichichi awards as Ferenc Puskas.
title: One more than Ronaldo: Messi wins fourth 'Pichichi' award

author: FourFourTwo
description: Lionel Messi outscored Cristiano Ronaldo in 2016-17, but how do the Barcelona and Real Madrid greats match up in LaLiga in 2016-17?
title: LaLiga glory for Ronaldo, Pichichi for Messi - how the great rivals compared in 2016-17

author: talkSPORT
description: Neymar has been encouraged by his father to leave Barcelona for Manchester United, according to reports. The 25-year-old has enjoyed another productive campaign at the Camp Nou – scoring or assisting 24 goals – but remains in the shadow of both Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez. Spanish outlet Diario Gol report the Brazilian’s father has specifically advised his son to move to the Premier League giants. The Red Devils have held a long-term interest in the forward and have been heavily linked with a big money move for his services in the past.
title: Manchester United news: Neymar advised by father to leave Barcelona for Old Trafford

author: talkSPORT
description: Cristiano Ronaldo has set yet another new record. The Real Madrid forward surpassed Jimmy Greaves' tally of 366 goals in Europe's top five leagues, netting his 367th and 368th in a 4-1 win over Celta Vigo in La Liga on Wednesday night. Record aside though, plenty remain split between determining who is the better player: Lionel Messi or Cristiano Ronaldo. While comparisons distract from the spectacle of watching two of the greatest ever footballers in action, we couldn't help but see how the two compare in front of goal in recent years.
title: Messi v Ronaldo: How the Barcelona and Real Madrid stars' club goal records compare, season-by-season
